meanings.sent1: She started saving money precollege for her future education.
meanings.sent2: He completed his high school exams precollege.
meanings.sent3: The students were excitedly discussing their precollege plans.
meanings.sent4: The early morning sun cast a precollege glow over the campus.
meanings.sent5: The precollege orientation session helped ease their transition to higher education.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the period before college
meanings.sent1: The precollege courses helped her gain valuable skills.
meanings.sent2: His precollege experiences shaped his academic interests.
meanings.sent3: The precollege event was a fun way to meet future classmates.
meanings.sent4: Her precollege decision to study abroad opened up new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The precollege counselor provided guidance on university applications.

meanings.definition: A program or course of study designed to prepare students for college
meanings.sent1: The precollege program offered SAT prep classes.
meanings.sent2: She enrolled in a precollege summer course in mathematics.
meanings.sent3: The precollege curriculum included college readiness workshops.
meanings.sent4: His participation in the precollege program boosted his confidence.
meanings.sent5: The precollege initiative aimed to increase access to higher education.
